notes.address_profile: EXPANDED: Captures ALL participants with tx counts, gas spent, ETH/ERC20 flows, call targets, and temporal bounds
notes.state_proof: Balance snapshots at checkpoint blocks enable before/after state reconstruction
notes.internal_transfers: Extracted from callTracer; any call with value > 0 emitted as internal_native_transfer
notes.block_ordering: Block transaction ordering from receipt.transactionIndex enables MEV/sandwich detection
notes.revert_decoding: Improved: decodes Error(string), Panic(uint256), and trace revertReason fields
notes.allowance_usage: Links Approval events to transferFrom calls for abuse detection
notes.mempool_capture: SIM-ONLY via eth_pendingTransactions; optional and may be empty
notes.governance_tracking: Storage slot monitoring for known admin/treasury/fee slots
notes.schema_version: See META/schema_version.json for full doc_type registry
